entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , White River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:17 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 3:47 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.0°C
Wind: SW 15 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
